author: saurichable
install_msg: Thank you for installing my cog! Note that **the output is user ID.** I suggest using it along with [nestedcommands](https://github.com/tmercswims/tmerc-cogs) and [scheduler](https://github.com/mikeshardmind/SinbadCogs).
name: Pick
short: Pick a random user or a user with a specified role.
description: Pick a random user or a user with a specified role. For the latter, use `[p]pickrole <role>` first.
